statements: SELECT * FROM virtual_consultation
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, consultation_date FROM virtual_consultation WHERE consultation_id = 1
SELECT * FROM virtual_consultation WHERE doctor_id = 3
SELECT consultation_id, patient_id, consultation_notes FROM virtual_consultation WHERE consultation_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT doctor_id, patient_id FROM virtual_consultation ORDER BY patient_id DESC
SELECT * FROM virtual_consultation ORDER BY consultation_date DESC, consultation_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, consultation_date FROM virtual_consultation WHERE doctor_id = 3 AND consultation_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY consultation_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, consultation_date, consultation_notes FROM virtual_consultation WHERE patient_id = 10 AND doctor_id = 5;
SELECT consultation_id, patient_id, doctor_id, consultation_date FROM virtual_consultation WHERE patient_id = 7 OR doctor_id = 8 ORDER BY consultation_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, consultation_date FROM virtual_consultation WHERE patient_id IN (1, 3, 5) OR doctor_id = 4 ORDER BY doctor_id DESC, consultation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM consultations WHERE doctor_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM consultations ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM consultations WHERE diagnosis = 'flu';
SELECT patient_id, record_date FROM medical_records WHERE record_type = 'X-ray' ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT doctor_id, count(*) FROM consultations GROUP BY doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM consultations WHERE doctor_id = 1 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, diagnosis FROM consultations WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' AND start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT record_id, record_date, record_type FROM medical_records WHERE record_type = 'Lab Results' ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM medical_records GROUP BY patient_id, doctor_id HAVING total_records > 3;

SELECT c.doctor_id, m.doctor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_consultations FROM consultations c JOIN medical_records m ON c.doctor_id = m.doctor_id GROUP BY c.doctor_id, m.doctor_id HAVING total_consultations > 5;
SELECT * FROM virtual_patient_consultations;
SELECT consultation_id, consultation_date, consultation_notes FROM virtual_patient_consultations WHERE doctor_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, consultation_date FROM virtual_patient_consultations ORDER BY consultation_date DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, COUNT(*) FROM virtual_patient_consultations GROUP BY doctor_id;
SELECT log_id, patient_id, log_date, log_type FROM communication_logs WHERE log_type = 'Incoming' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_patient_consultations;
SELECT consultation_id, patient_id, consultation_date FROM virtual_patient_consultations ORDER BY consultation_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, consultation_notes FROM virtual_patient_consultations WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT log_type, log_date, log_description FROM communication_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%' ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_consultations WHERE patient_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
SELECT consultation_date, consultation_notes FROM virtual_consultations WHERE doctor_id = '87654321-5678-4321-8765-432187654321' ORDER BY consultation_date DESC
SELECT user_name, user_type FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT record_id, record_type, record_data FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = '98765432-5678-6543-9876-543298765432' LIMIT 10
SELECT message FROM communication_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-03-01 23:59:59'
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT consultation_id, consultation_date FROM virtual_consultations WHERE patient_id = '4f48ee1c-8e64-4cf5-9276-fcf5d2046bd1';
SELECT user_name, user_type FROM users WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT record_id, patient_id, record_type FROM medical_records WHERE record_type = 'prescription' ORDER BY created_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_id, message, log_date FROM communication_logs WHERE user_id = 'e5c0cf5d-0cde-4fc6-8c7f-9b9bfe548387' ORDER BY log_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT consultation_date, consultation_notes FROM consultations WHERE consultation_id=1;
SELECT log_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message, log_date FROM communication_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM consultations;
SELECT consultation_id, patient_id, doctor_id, consultation_date FROM consultations ORDER BY consultation_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, contact_number FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT log_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message, log_date FROM communication_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
